Hero.title: Empower Your Learning Journey with AI Tutor
Hero.subtitle: Use advanced AI technology to provide personalized tutoring, helping you study effectively and achieve higher results.

About.title: About
About.subtitle: Our mission
About.content:
At Lumi, our mission is to empower students to achieve their academic goals with the help of cutting-edge AI technology. We believe that personalized, high-impact tutoring can make a significant difference in a student's learning journey.

Our platform offers an AI-powered chatbot that assists students with their exercises and study queries. Whether you need help understanding a complex concept, solving a tricky problem, or preparing for an exam, our chatbot is here to guide you every step of the way. Available both on our web app and as a Discord bot, our service ensures that you can access support whenever and wherever you need it.

We invite you to join our platform and experience the difference that personalized, AI-driven tutoring can make in your education. Let’s learn and grow together!

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Start for free and scale as you grow.
